question:
People in your area are having problems with their internet connection. Write a letter to the company which provides the connection.

In your letter,

describe the problems
explain how it is affecting people
say what the company should do to help
Write at least 150 words.

You do NOT need to write any addresses.

Begin your letter as follows:

Dear Sir or Madam,
text: I am writing this letter to inform you about my dissatisfaction with the internet network of your company. I had chosen one of the best speed fibre connections from your plans,However, I am facing some problems and getting a very slow speed. Additionally, we have online meetings by webcams which required fast connectivity to the internet.

In addition to this, the Fingerprint scanner is not working for some time due to the low amount of speed. Furthermore, loss of attendance records may threaten the company policy even though I am not able to manage the offline attendance system so it has created indiscipline in my company.

I want you to take action to speed up my connection by changing a very old modem device and replacement of all the wire connections with fibre wires. I am looking forward to seeing a positive response from your side.
